blogPost.excerpt: Hello, would you like to book a call with technology experts? Hacker Noon started a marketplace for on demand video calls with experts in programming, cryptocurrency, ux, remote work, outer space, startups, and futurism.
blogPost.body: Hello, would you like to book a call with technology experts? Hacker Noon started a marketplace for on demand video calls with experts in programming, cryptocurrency, ux, remote work, outer space, startups, and futurism.
blogPost.title: Tech Expert Video Calls - On demand video calls with hackernoon writers
blogPost.author: David Smooke

localize.description: 您好，您想预约技术专家的电话吗？Hacker Noon与编程、加密货币、用户体验、远程工作、外太空、初创企业和未来主义方面的专家建立了一个点播视频通话市场。
localize.tagline: 与黑客中午写手进行点播视频通话

localize.description: 您好，您想預約技術專家的電話嗎？Hacker Noon與編程、加密貨幣、用戶體驗、遠程工作、外太空、初創企業和未來主義方面的專家建立了一個點播視頻通話市場。
localize.tagline: 與黑客中午寫手進行點播視頻通話

next.excerpt: Hey you! Yes, you! You're part of the Product Hunt community! Whether you are making those great products, hunting the amazing ones, upvoting the ones you especially love, or just dicussing them - see how you impacted PH this year with ProductHunt Wrapped!
next.title: ProductHunt Wrapped - Maker or Hunter see how you added to the PH community!

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是产品猎头社区的一员！无论你是在制作那些伟大的产品，寻找令人惊叹的产品，还是提升你特别喜欢的产品，还是只是在讨论它们-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包装下对PH产生了怎样的影响！
localize.tagline: 制造者或猎人，看看你是如何加入PH社区的！

localize.description: 嘿，你！是的，就是你！您是產品獵頭社區的一員！無論你是在製作那些偉大的產品，尋找令人驚歎的產品，還是提升你特別喜歡的產品，還是隻是在討論它們-看看你今年在ProductHunt的包裝下對PH產生了怎樣的影響！
localize.tagline: 製造者或獵人，看看你是如何加入PH社區的！
